text: The Haven  is one of two common gathering places for locals in [[Sylbaran]] (the other being [[Lake's Edge]]). It is a vast, rolling meadow west of town. The [[Wardens of the Wood]] have a semi-permanent camp in the Haven, and many [[Reachers|Eldeen Reaches]] visiting Sylbaran from elsewhere—especially travelers from the [[Towering Wood]]—will pitch their tents or lay their bedrolls in the Haven. As long as they mind their manners, visitors can always find a place around the bonfire.
title: Haven (Sylbaran campsite)
